title: I’m Not Picky!
detail_text: <:th_ch0212/>Thanks for the food.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Oh, you’re finished, Mia?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Yeah. You can have my salad, Eli.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>If you’re actually full, then that’s fine, but you know you shouldn’t be a picky eater, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>...It’s not like I’m a picky eater. I’m just not in the mood for this. Besides, I’ve eaten vegetables before. I’ve had potatoes.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>...Won’t you at least eat half of it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Eh...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Just one bite, then.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Okay, fine... Ah, this dressing is really good...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Right? Alright, go ahead and enjoy it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
